text:
This happened for 49 days straight last year, but on 14 Jan @EnvAgency chief @JamesBevanEA told MPs "we are not allowing people to discharge sewage into chalk streams", apparently unaware that they very much are

 👏 @PJennings88 @RiverChess 

https://t.co/xKhosdkuvZ
RT @geykyn: Mildly encouraged by @thameswater comments over its disgraceful frequent discharges of untreated sewage into the beautiful Rive…

Accompanied by the usual BS statements from the @EnvAgency "We do allow storm overflows to discharge exceptionally into chalk streams".

Last time I checked, which was last week, TW had been dumping sewage into the River Chess for the 6th day in a row. Exceptional? https://t.co/N2khh8uHfr
